education.name: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

description: Designed and created an extensible and modular information retrieval tool with a partner
Able to search over highly technical documents. Utilizes an ensemble model of TF-IDF, pesudo-PageRank, clustering, query expansion using custom word embeddings, and more.
Performed better than an in-house Apache Solr instance.
Automated the reading and writing of Key Performance Indicators to a database using Visual Basic.
Developed data quality monitors in QlikView which were used to support the rollout of a worldwide application.
